category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMBOMAssessmentRepairPartialMatchQuickAction
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the default repair action that can be automatically set for "Partial Match" lines with a single candidate in the MBOM Assessment Repair view. If no action is specified, the checkbox for "Partial Match" lines will not appear in the view. The default value is "Propagate". Valid names are the values of the Fnd0BOMRepairAction LOV.
